verses.verse: I will stand <S%H5975><s%> upon my watch <S%H4931><s%>, and set <S%H3320><s%> me upon the tower <S%H4692><s%>, and will look <S%H7200><s%> forth to see <S%H7200><s%> what he will speak <S%H1696><s%> with me <S%H7725><s%>, and what I shall answer concerning my complaint <S%H8433><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H559><s%>, and said, Write <S%H3789><s%> the vision <S%H2377><s%>, and make it plain <S%H874><s%> upon tablets <S%H3871><s%>, that he may run <S%H7323><s%> that readeth it <S%H7121><s%>.

For the vision <S%H2377><s%> is yet for the appointed time <S%H4150><s%>, and it hasteth toward the end <S%H7093><s%>, and shall <S%H6315><s%> not lie <S%H3576><s%>: though it tarry <S%H4102><s%>, wait <S%H2442><s%> for it <S%H935><s%>; because it will surely come <S%H935><s%>, it will not delay <S%H309><s%>.
Behold <S%H5315><s%>, his soul is puffed up <S%H6075><s%>, it is not upright <S%H3474><s%> in him <S%H6662><s%>; but the righteous shall live <S%H2421><s%> by his faith <S%H530><s%>.

Yea <S%H3196><s%>, moreover, wine is treacherous <S%H898><s%>, a haughty <S%H3093><s%> man <S%H1397><s%>, that keepeth not at home <S%H5115><s%>; who enlargeth <S%H7337><s%> his desire <S%H5315><s%> as Sheol <S%H7585><s%>, and he is as death <S%H4194><s%>, and cannot be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>, but gathereth <S%H622><s%> unto him all nations <S%H1471><s%>, and heapeth <S%H6908><s%> unto him all peoples <S%H5971><s%>.

Shall not all these take up <S%H5375><s%> a parable <S%H4912><s%> against him <S%H4426><s%>, and a taunting proverb <S%H2420><s%> against him <S%H559><s%>, and say, Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that increaseth <S%H7235><s%> that which is not his <S%H3513><s%>! how long? and that ladeth himself with pledges <S%H5671><s%>!

Shall they not rise up <S%H6965><s%> suddenly <S%H6621><s%> that shall bite <S%H5391><s%> thee <S%H3364><s%>, and awake that shall vex <S%H2111><s%> thee <S%H4933><s%>, and thou shalt be for booty unto them?

Because thou hast plundered <S%H7997><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, all the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> shall plunder <S%H7997><s%> thee <S%H120><s%>, because of men's blood <S%H1818><s%>, and for the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to the land <S%H776><s%>, to the city <S%H7151><s%> and to all that dwell therein <S%H3427><s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that getteth <S%H1214><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> gain <S%H1215><s%> for his house <S%H1004><s%>, that he may set <S%H7760><s%> his nest <S%H7064><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>, that he may be delivered <S%H5337><s%> from the hand <S%H3709><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%>!

Thou hast devised <S%H3289><s%> shame <S%H1322><s%> to thy house <S%H1004><s%>, by cutting off <S%H7096><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and hast sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.
For the stone <S%H68><s%> shall cry out <S%H2199><s%> of the wall <S%H7023><s%>, and the beam out <S%H3714><s%> of the timber <S%H6086><s%> shall answer it <S%H6030><s%>.
Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that buildeth <S%H1129><s%> a town <S%H5892><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>, and establisheth <S%H3559><s%> a city <S%H7151><s%> by iniquity <S%H5766><s%>!

Behold <S%H3068><s%>, is it not of Jehovah of hosts <S%H6635><s%> that the peoples <S%H5971><s%> labor <S%H3021><s%> for the <S%H1767><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>, and the nations <S%H3816><s%> weary <S%H3286><s%> themselves for <S%H1767><s%> vanity <S%H7385><s%>?

For the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with the knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, as the waters <S%H4325><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that giveth his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%>, to thee that addest <S%H5596><s%> thy venom <S%H2573><s%>, and makest him drunken <S%H7937><s%> also <S%H5027><s%>, that thou mayest look on their nakedness <S%H4589><s%>!

Thou art filled <S%H7646><s%> with shame <S%H7036><s%>, and not glory <S%H3519><s%>: drink <S%H8354><s%> thou also <S%H6188><s%>, and be as one uncircumcised; the cup <S%H3563><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall come round <S%H5437><s%> unto thee <S%H7022><s%>, and foul shame shall be upon thy glory <S%H3519><s%>.

For the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> thee <S%H7701><s%>, and the destruction of the beasts <S%H929><s%>, which made them afraid <S%H2865><s%>; because of men <S%H120><s%>'s blood <S%H1818><s%>, and for the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to the land <S%H776><s%>, to the city <S%H7151><s%> and to all that dwell therein <S%H3427><s%>.

What profiteth <S%H3276><s%> the graven image <S%H6459><s%>, that the maker <S%H3335><s%> thereof hath graven <S%H6458><s%> it <S%H4541><s%>; the molten image, even the teacher <S%H3384><s%> of lies <S%H8267><s%>, that he that fashioneth <S%H3335><s%> its form <S%H3336><s%> trusteth <S%H982><s%> therein <S%H6213><s%>, to make dumb <S%H483><s%> idols <S%H457><s%>?

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that saith <S%H559><s%> to the wood <S%H6086><s%>, Awake <S%H6974><s%>; to the dumb <S%H1748><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, Arise <S%H5782><s%>! Shall this teach <S%H3384><s%>? Behold <S%H8610><s%>, it is overlaid with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%>, and there is no breath <S%H7307><s%> at all in the midst of it <S%H7130><s%>.
But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is in his holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>: let all the earth <S%H776><s%> keep silence <S%H2013><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>.
